title: I need help
body:
I downloaded League of Legends on my computer, but I stopped playing for a little bit. I went back to play again, but soon found that I was completely unable to open the game. I open it, and that icon in the center of my screen opens, but the I get a notification saying:
                                                                                                                        X
Another instance of launcher is running. Would you like to terminate it?
Yes                                                                                                        Cancel
Now, if I press 'yes,' it closes the launcher and League won't open. If I press 'cancel', the launcher closes and League won't open. If I press 'X' the launcher still closes, and League still doesn't open. If anybody could help me, I'd seriously appreciate it.

replies.body:
I posted a fix to this but Riot took it down. Are you on Windows 7 or Windows 10? Basically you need to uninstall the game. 

Delete all traces of the game including the files found it C:\Users\*username*AppData\Roaming\Riot Games an any other file you can find in C:\Users\*username*AppData*.

If you are on Windows 10 try running as admin first.

This sounds like a security setting situation to me!  A program or OS setting may be blocking the patcher from opening, so I recommend using the steps found in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
That means its doing some kinda update, close all & run it once, then let it running! because you said "I stopped playing for a little" probably you missed an update.
